dct_title_s: Plano de la zona petrolífera del Istmo
dct_description_sm: Shows existing, abandoned, and possible oil fields; pipelines; oil company lands; railroads; settlements; and watercourses. "Junio de 1917." Prime meridian: Mexico City.
